Subject: API rate limit spikes during intake
TextBody: We are seeing API rate limit errors between eight and ten am during patient intake can you investigate

Subject: Re API rate limit spikes during intake
TextBody: Thanks for the details we are reviewing current thresholds and recent traffic patterns

Subject: Fraud dashboard timing out
TextBody: Our fraud dashboard sometimes times out during morning peak can you help tune queries

Subject: Re Fraud dashboard timing out
TextBody: We identified two slow queries and will deploy index changes this week

Subject: Missed delivery alerts
TextBody: On call did not receive alerts for missed deliveries at the west hub last night

Subject: Re Missed delivery alerts
TextBody: We found a misconfigured notification rule and have deployed a fix

Subject: Black Friday synthetic checks failing
TextBody: Our synthetic checks are failing intermittently during load tests and causing noise

Subject: Re Black Friday synthetic checks failing
TextBody: We will tune thresholds and exclude expected latency during ramp up

Subject: Agent install failing on legacy servers
TextBody: Our older plant servers fail during agent install can you suggest options

Subject: Re Agent install failing on legacy servers
TextBody: We recommend a lightweight collector and limited metrics set for those servers

Subject: Control plane metrics delayed
TextBody: We are seeing several minutes of delay for control plane metrics can you investigate

Subject: Re Control plane metrics delayed
TextBody: We identified backlog in the metrics pipeline and are increasing capacity

Subject: Audit evidence export request
TextBody: We need incident and uptime exports for an upcoming regulatory audit

Subject: Re Audit evidence export request
TextBody: We can provide exports for the last two years and sample reports

Subject: Question about data retention
TextBody: Can you confirm current data retention settings for logs and metrics
